role.descr: instrument or manner if separate from arg 0

example.name: Transitive
example.text: He-1 might then make a few meaningless marks on the ground, *-1 to further mystify the audience.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'mystify' based on internet usage examples, membership in VN.VN entry in amuse-31.1. Comparison to 'perplex'.
